specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may form with any number of ranks or files, as long as all Stands are in base contact

specialRules.name: Vanguard (3)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may deploy up to 3" outside your Deployment Zone

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16")
specialRules.description: This Stand may perform a Volley Action with 3 dice at up to 16" range

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: This Stand may perform a Volley Action with 3 dice at up to 16" range with Armor Piercing (1)

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: This Stand may perform a Volley Action with 3 dice at up to 16" range with Armor Piercing (1)

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: The opponent must re-roll successful Defense rolls of '1' against this Stand's attacks

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: This Regiment automatically passes Morale Tests

specialRules.name: Fiend Hunter
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Clash and +2 to its Attacks characteristics when targeting Monsters or Brutes

specialRules.name: Flank
specialRules.description: This Regiment may deploy in the enemy Deployment Zone, outside of 12" of any enemy models

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic

specialRules.description: The opponent must re-roll successful Defense rolls of '1' against this Stand's attacks

specialRules.name: Iron Discipline
specialRules.description: When this Regiment performs a Rally or Combat Rally Action, it automatically removes its Broken status

specialRules.name: Support (3)
specialRules.description: This Regiment gains 3 additional Attack dice per supporting Stand

specialRules.name: Pike Formation
specialRules.description: Enemy Regiments suffer -3 to their Impact (X) Special Rule when in contact with this Regiment's front arc

drawEvents.name: Bastion (1)
drawEvents.description: Ignore the first wound inflicted on this Regiment before any Defense rolls are made

specialRules.name: Bravery
specialRules.description: This Regiment may reroll one failed Morale Test per Action

specialRules.description: The opponent must re-roll successful Defense rolls of '1' and '2' against this Stand's attacks

specialRules.name: Oblivious
specialRules.description: This Regiment is immune to the Terrifying and Fearsome special rules
